definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.chinese: 汽车转弯前车灯不断闪动。

sentences.english: The old head lifted; two points of light quivered in the old eyes.
sentences.chinese: 衰老的头抬了起来，昏花的眼中闪动着两个光点。

sentences.english: You want to avoid glaring, flickering, light.
sentences.chinese: 你也应该避免光线太耀眼或闪动的光。

sentences.english: Lights from offshore drilling platforms twinkled on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 近海钻探平台的灯光在海平线上闪动着。

sentences.english: Changsha---Volunteers in yellow T-shirts are everywhere in Xiangya Hospital, Changsha city.
sentences.chinese: 中南大学湘雅二医院里到处闪动着明亮的黄色身影。

sentences.english: Two yellow images flash over North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 北朝鲜上空有两个黄色图标在闪动。

sentences.english: Too the madam didn't speak, but the eye bottom is hesitant to twinkle.
sentences.chinese: 太夫人没有做声，眼底却有犹豫闪动。

sentences.english: A faint hope still flickered in her breast.
sentences.chinese: 一种微弱的希望仍在她的心中闪动着。

sentences.english: The flashing lights mean that the road is blocked. ?
sentences.chinese: 那闪动的灯光表示此路不通。

sentences.english: People's mind a flashing, countless demons began to lick it is smile.
sentences.chinese: 人的心念一闪动，无数的恶魔是开始舔牙微笑了。

sentences.english: Just shine a laser light or throw a ping pong ball.
sentences.chinese: 只要闪动雷射光或丢颗乒乓球就好。

sentences.english: The other option is to flash the taskbar icon.
sentences.chinese: 另一种方式是闪动任务栏图标。

sentences.english: The whole landscape becomes misty and glittering in the rain curtain covering the sky.
sentences.chinese: 山山水水，朦胧在漫天的雨幕中闪动。

sentences.english: Constant flashing light, in the blink, is near overcrowded. Monster.
sentences.chinese: 光芒没断闪动，眨眼间，附近就妖满为患嗄。

sentences.english: Julia shone the light around the cave.
sentences.chinese: 茱莉亚在洞四周闪动亮光。

definition: to flash through (one's mind)/to dodge (away from pursuers)
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
